ygData.subject: Raising wind skill
ygData.msgSnippet: When bard skill caps were maxxed at 200, I was able to max out my wind skill by firing up the invis song and going AFK in a safe spot.  Unlike raising brass
ygData.messageBody:
When bard skill caps were maxxed at 200, I was able to max out my wind skill
by firing up the invis song and going AFK in a safe spot. Unlike raising
brass skill, maxxing out my wind skill each level went by fairly quickly. I
could go AFK for 15 minutes or so and I would get the 5 skill point
increases. After the skill caps were raised, my Singing, String, and
Percussion skills were easily maxxed thru normal playing with songs like
Selos and Hymn. However, not once has my Wind skill gone up while using
Invis song. It is still at 200 while my singing, percussion and lute are
all around 230. I haven't bothered with Brass skill lately since its too
much of a hassle to go to the Arena in Lake Rathe plus I rarely use any of
the songs that are enhanced by brass instruments.

Has anyone else been able to get their wind skill over 200 just using Invis
song?

Galtin of E'ci


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
